short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Official AvidCaster Chat Overlay Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension reformats live stream's chat data for the purpose of providing a chat overlay ONLY!

After installing this extension, simply click on the "pop-out chat" feature on a live video, to enable the feature.

To use it as a lower-third layer with video switchers like ATEM, you can click on the fullscreen icon, then use an upstream key (luma or chroma) to filter out the unwanted portion of the page.

Features

* Add the overlay window as a lower-third to any video switcher with down/upstream keys
* Fireworks support, automatic for super-chats, or manually triggered for new members, birthdays, etc.
* Mirroring option to handle both Left to Right and Right to Left languages
* Highlighting feature for a quick view of specific topics, such as "QA", "Question", etc. 
* Supported chats: Youtube, Twitch
